name: Random Bullet
description:
Game made in two days for the GMTK2020 game jam.

You move with w a s d or arrows. When the bar underneath the crosshair gets to zero the player shoots. Above the players head your currently equipped bullet appears and inside the big recipient in the background you can see the bullet that will come next.

This is my second jam ever so please be gentle.

Music made by Slice; https://www.instagram.com/slice_29/ and https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHRgDPDv88N7MQAh3TV2DMA
